summary: A simple man from a village falls in love with his new neighbor. He enlists the help of his musical-theater friends to woo the lovely girl-next-door away from her music teacher.
cast: Sunil Dutt|Saira Banu|Mehmood|Kishore Kumar|Om Prakash|Agha|Mukri|Sunder|Ganga|Praveen Paul|Keshto Mukherjee|Raj Kishore|Dulari|Ratna|Moolchand|Jankidas|Niranjan Tiwari
title: Padosan
